The sawn off shotgun he has was seized in a "criminal" context. In the UK that could just be simple ownership of this antique by an old old man. jeez, the animations are so rigid and wobbly

An interesting tidbit that wasn't mentioned during the bit on blood and gore getting into the action, is that an AR-15 or M-16 rifle would probably be the most likely weapon to continue to operate if you got gunk in the ejection port.

See, the semi-DI operating system on the AR dumps gas out ports in the bolt and through that ejection port, quite literally blowing any dirt, mud, sand, or even brains that may have gotten in the way well clear of the action just before it opens.

This is why piston uppers like the HK 416 are a tradeoff rather than a straight upgrade. The piston uppers don't get as much powder fouling inside the action, but they are more likely to die of mud ingestion than a traditional DI upper.
When he says that's a Model 01 lower, it's actually an XM16E1 partial fence lower. Still makes me want to cry 😭
